main.name: Kody Williams
main.description: Welcome to my portfolio
main.bio: I'm a dedicated and motivated Software Developer with interests in data analysis, automation, web/mobile base applications, team collaboration, and project management. My go-to tools for project organization and planning is Jira and Confluence. My peers have described me as a person who is exceptional, takes charge, organizes and leads, easily collaborative, and a person who provides quality deliverables early. I can apply cutting-edge industry skills and knowledge such as Object-Oriented Design, algorithms, front-end and back-end tools in React environments, and SCRUM development practices. I'm an out-of-the-box thinker committed to punctual handover of deliverables while adapting to post-COVID work practices.
main.contactmessage: If my skills and qualifications seem like a good fit, please don't hesitate to contact me! Thank you.

education.classes: Algorithms, Bioinformatics, Data Structures, Computer Operating Systems, Computational Worlds, Database Systems, Internet of Things, Machine Learning, Machine Organization, Programming Language Concepts, Software Development & QA, Foundations of Mathematical Reasoning, Matrix Algebra, Statistics

projects.title: Clinical Trial end-to-end project
projects.description: Developed APIs using C# and SSIS to source data from a public website, designed a normalized data model, implemented the physical design on SQL Server database and developed a visualization in Power BI.

projects.title: Folder Decompression assignment
projects.description: Developed decompression logic using C#. The job runs daily via extracts files in a designated directory and archives the extracted files.

projects.title: Pharmacy Data Mart projects
projects.description: Under the guidance of a data architect, developed a Data Mart using SQL to query data from Enterprise Data Warehouse. Performed detailed validations against Epic Hyperspace. Developed Power BI to support the visualization needs.

projects.title: Analytics and data request assignments
projects.description: Fulfilled numerous data and analytics requests using Epic Clarity SQL database environment. Performed triaging and scoping of various clinical and financial data requests including incidents. Identified key data points to meet user requirements.

projects.title: System Administration of Microsoft Azure
projects.description: Set up user profiles and security and manage their access to the vendor-hosted Azure environment.

technicalSkills.additional: Algorithms, Data Structures, Complexity Analysis, Software Development, Object-Oriented Design, Database Design, Normalization, PowerBI, Crystal Reports & Webi, DDL & DML, NodeJS, ReactJS, SSIS.
